text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It's the day of the tryouts—a multitude<n>of races highlighting
up-and-coming<n>runners.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Not wanting to be late, I make my way<n>through the academy
grounds,<n>heading straight for the track.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Ah! You there! Yes, you. Could you<n>help me with a tiny little
favor?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Yup, yup. If anyone comes by asking<n>questions, just tell
them, "Nature?<n>Nope, haven't seen her!" and send<n>them
on their—

text_block_list.name: Friendly Woman
text_block_list.text: Ah, Natie! She's here—we finally<n>found her!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Ugh...

text_block_list.name: Friendly Man
text_block_list.text:
What, so you were here the whole<n>time? You weren't at the
track, so we<n>thought you mighta overslept or<n>summat.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Uh, just for the record, I'm notthat laid-back. If anything, I'vebeen getting up earlier and earlierlately.

text_block_list.name: Friendly Woman
text_block_list.text:
Haha, you should hear yourself, Natie!<n>You sounded just
like us old folks<n>there!

text_block_list.name: Friendly Woman
text_block_list.text:
More importantly—the tryouts! We're<n>all here to cheer you
on, so go get<n>'em, Natie!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Um, I appreciate all of you coming out<n>here... But don't get
your hopes up too<n>much, 'kay?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
I know my name makes me sound<n>like a natural winner, but
to be honest,<n>my talents really aren't all that.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Like, the best I placed in my<n>scrimmages was third. And it's
not<n>like I've got any grand ol' dreams<n>either.

text_block_list.name: Friendly Man
text_block_list.text:
Now, now, don't say that. Well, we<n>gotta get ready too.
Make sure ya<n>warm those muscles up, Natie!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Haha... Yeah, 'preciate it.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: ...Hey, so um, sorry about that. Totally<n>left you hanging there.
choice_data_list:
Were those people part of your fan club or
something?

Were those people part of your fan club or
something?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Nah, it's nothing like that. They're<n>just some folks from the
local<n>shopping district who're here to<n>support me.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
It's just, I can't really live up to their<n>expectations, so I
wanted to avoid<n>them if I could.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: By the way... Hm? That badge on<n>your collar...

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Wait, are you a trainer here?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Whoa, really?! Yikes, then I totallyflubbed my elevator pitch! Even if Idid say nothing but the gospeltruth...

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Um, haha... Hey, the name's Nature.<n>I'm running in today's
tryouts, so<n>guess you'll be seeing me kinda...

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Anyways, catcha 'round.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The strangely cynical Nice Nature<n>promptly dashes away in
the direction<n>of the track.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: And now, the tryouts begin!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant, pant... All right, firstplace!

text_block_list.name: New Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
S-simply immaculate! Such beautiful<n>and refined running,
Tokai Teio!

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Looks like the rumors about her being<n>the second coming of
Symboli Rudolf<n>were true! Teio, please let me scout<n>you!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Now, now, wait your turn! Line up<n>before me, okay? ♪

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As the races go on, promising racers<n>are scouted one after
another by the<n>watching trainers.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: However...

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Man, that's Teio for you. Always<n>stealing the show...

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
She's got the talent, the skill, and the<n>looks. And on top of
that, she's got<n>her big dream of following in Rudolf's<n>
footsteps.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Man, she radiates main character<n>vibes. We might as well
be living in<n>different worlds.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Girls like her... really are something<n>else.

text_block_list.name: Tryouts Official A
text_block_list.text: Nice Nature! Please get ready for your<n>race!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Right, roger that. Well, time for my<n>turn!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Bang!

text_block_list.name: Friendly Supporters
text_block_list.text: Natieeeee! Yeah, just like that! You<n>go, Natieee!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant, pant...

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
They're rounding the fourth turn and<n>entering the final
stretch! Can our<n>front-runner maintain her position?!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
But look at who's giving chase—it's<n>Nice Nature! Nice Nature
has closed the<n>gap in an instant!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
My eyes are glued to her amazing<n>running form. What a
clean rush in the<n>final spurt!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Aaand—it's too little, too late! Nice<n>Nature, finishing in third
place!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant... Phew. Well, that'sjust how it goes.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Even when I go all-out... third's all I<n>get.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Her results might've been<n>unfortunate, but her running back<n>
there was picture-perfect. Now's my<n>chance!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Huh?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Ummm... Ah. Someone's a bit of a<n>ditz, huh? Teio's line is
thataway,<n>'kay?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: H-huuuuuh?!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
But like, um... Oh, I'm not saying no,<n>okay? If anything,
thanks for picking<n>me and all that.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
It's just, well... You sure you want<n>me? I guess if you get
fed up with<n>me... just tell me, all right?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Still, until then... At least for now...<n>I-I'm in your hands.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I excitedly shake the hand of a<n>nonplussed Nice Nature,
sealing the<n>deal as her new trainer.
